alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Lower St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued December 13 at 9:27PM CST until December 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, minor coastal flooding expected. For the Coastal Flood Watch, significant coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...Lower St. Bernard and Eastern Orleans Parishes. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Thursday. For the Coastal Flood Watch, from Thursday evening through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Timing is concurrent with high tide cycle and levels will be exacerbated by east winds.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
